summary: The module provides an example workflow for training and evaluating a graph neural network model on node classification data. It loads graph datasets, processes class identifiers, optionally applies dimensionality reduction to node features, builds a GCN or RECT model, runs training, and assesses embedding quality using evaluation utilities.
business_intent: Demonstrate how to apply the RECT architecture with PyTorch for node classification, offering a reference implementation that can be adapted for real-world graph learning projects.
